TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationSectionGroup extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.

span.span: Represents a group of related sections within a configuration file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks （如 Web.config 文件中） 的配置文件中设置组织成部分。Settings in configuration files (such as the Web.config file) are organized into sections. 由于相关的某些部分，它通常是很方便的做法它们节组中。Because some sections are related, it is often convenient to group them in a section group. 类表示`sectionGroup`时，将使用组的各个部分中定义的 XML 元素`configSections`配置文件元素。The class represents the `sectionGroup` XML element that is used to group sections when they are defined in the `configSections` element of a configuration file. 部分组可以嵌套 （节组可以包含其他节组以及部分）。Section groups can be nested (a section group can contain other section groups as well as sections). 下面的示例演示`configSections`定义三个嵌套的节组元素：The following example shows a `configSections` element that defines three nested section groups: ```
``` 配置系统加载到的配置文件中的设置对象。The configuration system loads settings from configuration files into objects. 你可以使用和属性来访问的部分和节组中包含对象。You can use the and properties to access the sections and section groups that are contained in a object. 有关如何从配置文件访问信息的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about how to access information from configuration files, see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类检索配置设置。The following example shows how to use the class to retrieve configuration settings. 该示例是一个控制台应用程序读取配置设置和有关每个配置节组和中它的部分向控制台写入信息。The example is a console application that reads configuration settings and writes information about each configuration section group and the sections in it to the console. `Main`方法将加载到的配置设置对象，检索集合从对象，然后调用`ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`方法以显示的部分属性值。The `Main` method loads the configuration settings into a object, retrieves the collection from the object, and then calls the `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` method to display the section property values. `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`方法循环访问的节组和调用`ShowSectionGroupInfo`为每个方法。The `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` method iterates through the section groups and calls the `ShowSectionGroupInfo` method for each one. `ShowSectionGroupInfo`方法显示的名称的节组、 某些属性值和它所包含的部分的名称。The `ShowSectionGroupInfo` method displays the name of the section group, some property values, and the names of the sections that it contains. 如果该部分组包含节组，此方法调用`ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo`以递归方式来显示这些节组。If the section group contains section groups, this method calls `ShowSectionGroupCollectionInfo` recursively to display those section groups. `indentLevel`字段用于将空间添加到左侧显示要显示的行的逻辑分组。The `indentLevel` field is used to add spaces to the left side of displayed lines to show logical groupings. 所有行都仅限于 79 个字符的文本，以避免换行，这将导致更难以区分的逻辑分组。All lines are limited to 79 characters of text to avoid line wrapping, which would make it harder to distinguish the logical groupings. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#1)]

summary.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

span.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以强制写入配置文件，即使它它们并不需要，因为它已在父文件中声明的对象。The method can force a object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool force) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void ForceDeclaration(bool require) cil managed

summary.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

span.span: Forces the declaration for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法强制将此声明，以写入到文件中，如果`force`是`true`。The method forces this declaration to be written to the file if `force` is `true`. 如果`force`是`false`，可能会忽略此操作，如果对象必须由系统。If `force` is `false`, this action might be ignored if the object is required by the system. 方法可以强制写入配置文件，即使它它们并不需要，因为它已在父文件中声明的对象。The method can force a object to be written to a configuration file, even if it is not required because it is already declared in a parent file. 此外，它可以删除组从配置文件如果不需要组。Also, it can remove a group from a configuration file if the group is not required. 你可能想要使用方法，以使配置文件从一台计算机更移植到另一个字符串，而无需担心是否组声明已存在。You might want to use the method to make a configuration file more portable from one computer to another, without worrying about whether the group declaration already exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/CS/ConfigurationSectionGroup.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup/VB/ConfigurationSectionGroup.vb#13)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在配置文件中，声明节组属性返回`true`。If the section group is declared in the configuration file, the property returns `true`. 属性返回`false`如果本节继承自 Machine.config 或父配置文件。The property returns `false` if this section is inherited from Machine.config or a parent configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例确定是否的此实例声明。The following code example determines whether this instance of is declared. 这是更大的示例的概览中提供的一部分类。This is part of a larger example provided in the overview for the class. abstract member ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName -> bool override this.ShouldSerializeSectionGroupInTargetVersion : System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName -> bool

span.span: The target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

summary.span: Indicates whether the current instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

span.span: Indicates whether the current instance should be serialized when the configuration object hierarchy is serialized for the specified target version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

returns.span: if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current section group should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] 及更高版本创建的每个配置节组必须显式重写此方法并返回 `true`，但仅在此节组对于 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的指定版本有效时如此。Each configuration section group that is created for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] and later versions must explicitly override this method and return `true`, but only if the section group is valid for the specified version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 不必更改已为 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的早期版本创建的现有配置节组。Existing configuration section groups that were created for earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] do not have to be changed. 基类型包含始终返回此方法的默认实现`true`。The base type contains a default implementation of this method that always returns `true`. 换而言之，如果配置节组实施者不重写此方法，默认情况下配置节组将为进行序列化所有 framework 版本。In other words, if a configuration section group implementer does not override this method, by default the configuration section group will be serialized for all framework versions.
